name: places/ChIJwyxSOyr3wokRHJ9mGUQptlw
formattedAddress: 2310 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd, New York, NY 10030, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2310 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd, New York, NY 10030, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Adorned Salon, and I must say, it was an absolutely delightful experience from start to finish. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm smile and offered a choice of coffee, tea, or wine, along with some delicious snacks to enjoy during my appointment.

What truly stood out to me was the genuine care and expertise displayed by the staff, particularly Ami and Candice, who I’ve had the pleasure of being my stylist and who are both incredibly talented stylists. Not only did they listen attentively to my desired look and past experiences with my hair, but they also took the time to educate me on maintaining my hair for optimal health. (It’s works! They know their stuff)

Throughout my visit, I was engaged in wonderful conversations, making the salon feel like a welcoming and comfortable space. It was evident that they were not only skilled in their craft but also genuinely invested in maintaining the integrity of my hair while achieving my desired style.

I left Adorned Salon feeling not only pampered but also confident in my new look. I highly recommend anyone looking for a top-notch salon experience to pay a visit to Ami or Candice at Adorned Salon. I'm already eagerly anticipating the day when my daughter is old enough to join me in experiencing their exceptional service and expertise.

originalText.text:
I absolutely love coming to Adorned and am glad to call this salon my
“Hair Home”! I have been coming here for about 3+ years and really appreciate their focus on healthy hair since I’m a freelancer and usually do not have time to take care of my tresses. All of the stylists that are on staff are amazing, especially the master stylist/owner Amikole. If you’re looking for top tier service with dedicated and detail oriented stylists in a beautiful space, look no further than Adorned! You will not be disappointed!

originalText.text:
Adorned is a beautiful salon,where woman can relax and have their hair receive the proper attention it deserves. Ami and her staff are very knowledgeable about hair care and will provide recommendations to maintain your hair in between appointments.
I have been to other salons where I have felt uncomfortable, but I love coming here for service.

originalText.text: I have been going to adorned for three years. I always feel like VIP when I go. From the welcome from the owner, to the coffee, to the cute decor! Most of all, adorned has supported me in loving my natural curls and redefining what natural means! My curls are curlying now! I love it here!

text.text: I have been going to adorned for three years. I always feel like VIP when I go. From the welcome from the owner, to the coffee, to the cute decor! Most of all, adorned has supported me in loving my natural curls and redefining what natural means! My curls are curlying now! I love it here!

originalText.text: I had not been to the salon in over a decade! Made appointments at other salons only to have them cancelled at the last minute. I was so fustrated with salons. But then I found Adorned! The salon is beautiful. Very well decorated. The appointment started on time and the salon was pretty quiet.  I had the Adorned Experience Gold with Natasha. She immediately offered me a drink when I arrived.  She was very friendly and talked me through the entire process. She gave me some tips for caring for my hair as well as some tips for family members. She was very gentle with my hair and took her time. She checked my scalp for any issues. My hair was pretty healthy besides the fact I really needed a cut due to split ends. I felt very comfortable with her cutting my hair. The results are beautiful and speak for themselves. The pics are of the cut, not the silk press. The silk press was soft, flowing, and silky.  So far no heat damage or breakage!  I haven't gotten a silk press in years so I didn't think it would stay more than few hours but it lasted for 1 week! I can't wait for my next appointment.
